argumentText:
ARGUMENT
a b x y z

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_retop | |- ( topGen ` ran (,) ) e. Top |
| 2 |  | #P_tg2 | |- ( ( x e. ( topGen ` ran (,) ) /\ y e. x ) -> E. z e. ran (,) ( y e. z /\ z C_ x ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_retopbas | |- ran (,) e. TopBases |
| 4 |  | #P_bastg | |- ( ran (,) e. TopBases -> ran (,) C_ ( topGen ` ran (,) ) ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_ax-mp | |- ran (,) C_ ( topGen ` ran (,) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_simprl | |- ( ( ( x e. ( topGen ` ran (,) ) /\ y e. x ) /\ ( z e. ran (,) /\ ( y e. z /\ z C_ x ) ) ) -> z e. ran (,) ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_sseldi | |- ( ( ( x e. ( topGen ` ran (,) ) /\ y e. x ) /\ ( z e. ran (,) /\ ( y e. z /\ z C_ x ) ) ) -> z e. ( topGen ` ran (,) ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_simprrr | |- ( ( ( x e. ( topGen ` ran (,) ) /\ y e. x ) /\ ( z e. ran (,) /\ ( y e. z /\ z C_ x ) ) ) -> z C_ x ) |
| 9 |  | #P_selpw | |- ( z e. ~P x <-> z C_ x ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_sylibr | |- ( ( ( x e. ( topGen ` ran (,) ) /\ y e. x ) /\ ( z e. ran (,) /\ ( y e. z /\ z C_ x ) ) ) -> z e. ~P x ) |
| 11 | 7, 10 | #P_elind | |- ( ( ( x e. ( topGen ` ran (,) ) /\ y e. x ) /\ ( z e. ran (,) /\ ( y e. z /\ z C_ x ) ) ) -> z e. ( ( topGen ` ran (,) ) i^i ~P x ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_simprrl | |- ( ( ( x e. ( topGen ` ran (,) ) /\ y e. x ) /\ ( z e. ran (,) /\ ( y e. z /\ z C_ x ) ) ) -> y e. z ) |
| 13 |  | #P_ioof | |- (,) : ( RR* X. RR* ) --> ~P RR |
| 14 |  | #P_ffn | |- ( (,) : ( RR* X. RR* ) --> ~P RR -> (,) Fn ( RR* X. RR* ) ) |
| 15 |  | #P_ovelrn | |- ( (,) Fn ( RR* X. RR* ) -> ( z e. ran (,) <-> E. a e. RR* E. b e. RR* z = ( a (,) b ) ) ) |
| 16 | 13, 14, 15 | #P_mp2b | |- ( z e. ran (,) <-> E. a e. RR* E. b e. RR* z = ( a (,) b ) ) |
| 17 |  | #P_oveq2 | |- ( z = ( a (,) b ) -> ( ( topGen ` ran (,) ) |`t z ) = ( ( topGen ` ran (,) ) |`t ( a (,) b ) ) ) |
| 18 |  | #P_iooscon | |- ( ( topGen ` ran (,) ) |`t ( a (,) b ) ) e. SCon |
| 19 | 17, 18 | #P_syl6eqel | |- ( z = ( a (,) b ) -> ( ( topGen ` ran (,) ) |`t z ) e. SCon ) |
| 20 | 19 | #P_rexlimivw | |- ( E. b e. RR* z = ( a (,) b ) -> ( ( topGen ` ran (,) ) |`t z ) e. SCon ) |
| 21 | 20 | #P_rexlimivw | |- ( E. a e. RR* E. b e. RR* z = ( a (,) b ) -> ( ( topGen ` ran (,) ) |`t z ) e. SCon ) |
| 22 | 16, 21 | #P_sylbi | |- ( z e. ran (,) -> ( ( topGen ` ran (,) ) |`t z ) e. SCon ) |
| 23 | 22 | #P_ad2antrl | |- ( ( ( x e. ( topGen ` ran (,) ) /\ y e. x ) /\ ( z e. ran (,) /\ ( y e. z /\ z C_ x ) ) ) -> ( ( topGen ` ran (,) ) |`t z ) e. SCon ) |
| 24 | 11, 12, 23 | #P_jca32 | |- ( ( ( x e. ( topGen ` ran (,) ) /\ y e. x ) /\ ( z e. ran (,) /\ ( y e. z /\ z C_ x ) ) ) -> ( z e. ( ( topGen ` ran (,) ) i^i ~P x ) /\ ( y e. z /\ ( ( topGen ` ran (,) ) |`t z ) e. SCon ) ) ) |
| 25 | 24 | #P_ex | |- ( ( x e. ( topGen ` ran (,) ) /\ y e. x ) -> ( ( z e. ran (,) /\ ( y e. z /\ z C_ x ) ) -> ( z e. ( ( topGen ` ran (,) ) i^i ~P x ) /\ ( y e. z /\ ( ( topGen ` ran (,) ) |`t z ) e. SCon ) ) ) ) |
| 26 | 25 | #P_reximdv2 | |- ( ( x e. ( topGen ` ran (,) ) /\ y e. x ) -> ( E. z e. ran (,) ( y e. z /\ z C_ x ) -> E. z e. ( ( topGen ` ran (,) ) i^i ~P x ) ( y e. z /\ ( ( topGen ` ran (,) ) |`t z ) e. SCon ) ) ) |
| 27 | 2, 26 | #P_mpd | |- ( ( x e. ( topGen ` ran (,) ) /\ y e. x ) -> E. z e. ( ( topGen ` ran (,) ) i^i ~P x ) ( y e. z /\ ( ( topGen ` ran (,) ) |`t z ) e. SCon ) ) |
| 28 | 27 | #P_rgen2 | |- A. x e. ( topGen ` ran (,) ) A. y e. x E. z e. ( ( topGen ` ran (,) ) i^i ~P x ) ( y e. z /\ ( ( topGen ` ran (,) ) |`t z ) e. SCon ) |
| 29 |  | #P_islly | |- ( ( topGen ` ran (,) ) e. Locally SCon <-> ( ( topGen ` ran (,) ) e. Top /\ A. x e. ( topGen ` ran (,) ) A. y e. x E. z e. ( ( topGen ` ran (,) ) i^i ~P x ) ( y e. z /\ ( ( topGen ` ran (,) ) |`t z ) e. SCon ) ) ) |
| 30 | 1, 28, 29 | #P_mpbir2an | |- ( topGen ` ran (,) ) e. Locally SCon |
